content: Write a Python function that takes a list of numbers and returns the average.
Create a Python class representing a Circle with a method to compute its area.
Write a JavaScript function that checks if a string is a palindrome.
Write a Python function that reads a file and prints its contents line by line.
Implement a factorial function in Python using recursion.
Create a function in C that returns the maximum of two integers.
Write a Python decorator that logs the execution time of a function.
Write a simple SQL query to get all users older than 30.
